Name: SQL database builder
Description: Builds a SQL database from the MS1 and MS2 data via R's mzml2db package.

Parameters.Name: Database type
Parameters.Description: The type of SQL database to be constructed

Parameters.Name: Output database pathname
Parameters.Description: The name of the database to be produced including its absolute path. Include quotes if there are spaces in the path

Parameters.Name: MS levels
Parameters.Description: Which MS levels to write into the database? Passed directly to msconvert (int_set syntax).

Parameters.Name: Sort by
Parameters.Description: Sorting order used during database construction. Defaults to filename>rt>mz.

Parameters.Name: Database file subset
Parameters.Description: Regular expression used to subset raw files by absolute path.

Parameters.Name: Centroid?
Parameters.Description: Use vendor centroiding in msconvert? FALSE means leave in profile mode.

Parameters.Name: msconvert path
Parameters.Description: Absolute path to msconvert if not on system PATH.

Parameters.Name: Intermediate mzML write path
Parameters.Description: Override R's tempdir() for the location where mzMLs are written.

Parameters.Name: Remove mzMLs?
Parameters.Description: Remove temporary mzML files after database creation.
